ultra_lite.name: Ultra Lite
ultra_lite.description: Least passes, weakest effect, greatest performance. It's like having a smudge on your glasses.

lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Less passes, weaker effect, greater performance.

strong.name: Strong
strong.description: More passes, stronger effect, lesser performance.

ultra_strong.name: Ultra Strong
ultra_strong.description: Too many passes, strongest effect, worst performance. It's like having Vaseline in your eyes.
